reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweatshirt cute, festive, and soft, with a great fit and nice thickness.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable
items.body: Super cute, comfortable. Great holiday sweater. Wore pink collared top underneath for contrast. True to size. Quality is decent, soft, not itchy. Read more
items.author: asiancajun

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute!!!
items.body: Very cute mid weight sweater. The Boo stitching is so cute. Perfect for teachers or the office when you want to participate in holiday dress up but not fully commit to a full costume. I washed in garment bag & no fading or shrinkage & stitching stayed intact. Laid flat to dry. Will buy again in the other holiday choices Read more
items.author: AmazonShopper

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fun!
items.body: Knowing it's a no name from Amazon, this is cute and festive and fun! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better Than Expected!
items.body: Purchased for an “ugly” Christmas sweater work party (but I don’t do ugly lol). This is way better looking than I expected. The sweater itself is soft, and not itchy. It’s not like amazing quality material or anything, but not uncomfortable either. I purchased a small because it was the smallest size, but an XS would have prob fit a little better (I am 5’5, 130lbs, 34/26/36 size 2 or 4). I like this one better than the other versions I’ve seen because the writing is bigger, and it’s very sparkly. I attached a picture of a white version I purchased (not from this particular brand) that shows the difference in lettering size. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars VERY CUTE
items.body: Super cute! Got this to wear with pink and green checkered pants for Christmas countdown for work theme - Merry Pinkmas. It’s good quality material. I don’t feel that it’s see through. Could easily layer. I got a size Large I am 5’2” 155ish lbs 32DD. It wasn’t quite the oversized look I wanted but fits well. Was a great price for the quality. Some people said that their “&” sign was brown? Mine was gold. Super cute. Read more
items.author: McKenzie Rowell

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s cute but the material is questionable
items.body: Would I purchase this again? Probably not. It’s super cute but it does itch some after wearing it for a few hours, mostly where the stitching of the writing is. I will probably wear a tank under it from now on. I hope it will stand up in the washing machine. Read more
items.author: Shane and Abby S.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute & Comfy
items.body: Such a cute and fun Christmas sweater! True to size, soft, & comfy! Read more
items.author: Debbie Laliberte

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Looks like a used sweater
items.body: Not only did this product keep getting delayed with being delivered but it arrived today with strands of hair, dirty and the sleeves already pilling! Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Ha-orange Pumpkin Face, White Christmas Tree, A Black Love, Pink Love Heart, Ch-apricot Bow, B White Lucky, Ma-white Mardi Gras, White2, Black, Green Lucky Clover, Green Shamrock, White Irish, A White Xo, White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
